LanguageData.DeepGravload_CommandManageToggleDesc: Assign this storage to the gravship stock. Colonists may still consume its contents, but they won't haul items in or out unless commanded through the gravship cargo interface.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_CommandLoadCargoDesc: Manage gravship cargo transfers between the colony and the gravship.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_CommandLoadCargoDisabled: Cargo loading is already in progress.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_CommandLoadCargoNoStorage: No stockpiles or shelves are set as gravcore managed.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_Error_NoItemsSelected: Select at least one item to load.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_Error_NoManagedCells: No managed gravload storage is available for this gravship.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_Error_LoadInProgress: Loading is already underway for this gravship.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_Error_ItemAlreadyManaged: {0} is already managed by the gravship.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_Error_ItemAlreadyQueued: {0} is already queued for gravship loading.
LanguageData.DeepGravload_Error_NotEnoughSpace: The gravship's managed storage does not have enough free space.
